translation: Thus, you shall be freed from the bonds of actions yielding good and evil fruits; with the mind steadfast in the Yoga of renunciation, and liberated, you shall come to Me.
commentary: 9.28 Shubhashubhaphalaih from good and evil fruits? Evam thus? Mokshyase (thou) shalt be freed? karmabandhanaih from the bonds of actions? Sannyasa Yoga Yuktaatma with the mind steadfast in the Yoga of renunciation? liberated liberated? Me to Me?
